resources.string: Predict the number of Crimes by the Year
Please note that the regression is calculated purely on the historic data provided by the Police API and what filters are applied by the user.
In order to use the location functionalities of CrimeWiz, please allow the app to use your location while you are on the Map feature.
The crime data used in this application is obtained using the UK Police API (https://data.police.uk/) under the Open Government Licence v3.0.
The MPAndroidChart (https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart) library was used when plotting the various graphs.
